trans-unit.source: Displays the evolution of the volume, number of blocks and deduplication ratio for the deduplication engine on <server_name> over the time period you choose (by default, one day).

seg-source.mrk: Displays the evolution of the volume, number of blocks and deduplication ratio for the deduplication engine on <server_name> over the time period you choose (by default, one day).

target.mrk: L’historique des états affiche l'évolution du volume, le nombre de blocs et le ratio de déduplication pour le moteur de déduplication sur <nom_serveur> sur la période de temps que vous choisissez (par défaut, un jour).

trans-unit.source: The volume and number of blocks is:

seg-source.mrk: The volume and number of blocks is:

target.mrk: Le volume et le nombre de blocs est :

trans-unit.source: Stored Corresponds to the actual volume/number of blocks stored after deduplication.

seg-source.mrk: Stored Corresponds to the actual volume/number of blocks stored after deduplication.

target.mrk: Stocké Correspond au volume / nombre réel de blocs stockés après la déduplication.

trans-unit.source: Recyclable Indicates all the volume/number of blocks in maintenance that are ready to be removed from the repository.

seg-source.mrk: Recyclable Indicates all the volume/number of blocks in maintenance that are ready to be removed from the repository.

target.mrk: Recyclable Indique tous les volumes / nombres de blocs en maintenance qui peuvent être supprimés de l'espace de stockage.

trans-unit.source: The deduplication ratio represents all <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protected volume (the protected volume is the single version of all files and folders, without history) divided by the volume stored in the deduplication engine.

seg-source.mrk: The deduplication ratio represents all <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protected volume (the protected volume is the single version of all files and folders, without history) divided by the volume stored in the deduplication engine.

target.mrk: Le ratio de déduplication représente le volume protégé de <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (le volume protégé est la version unique de tous les fichiers et dossiers, sans historique) divisé par le volume stocké dans le moteur de déduplication.

trans-unit.source: If the periods proposed by the application do not suit, you can configure a customized period. <MadCap:xref href="Manage_Activity_History_Component.htm#aln_admin_1282167276_1170989" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To configure a customized period</MadCap:xref> for details.

seg-source.mrk: If the periods proposed by the application do not suit, you can configure a customized period.

<MadCap:xref href="Manage_Activity_History_Component.htm#aln_admin_1282167276_1170989" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To configure a customized period</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: Si les périodes proposées par défaut par l’application ne conviennent pas, vous pouvez paramétrer vos propres périodes pour le calcul et l’affichage des graphiques.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Manage_Activity_History_Component.htm#aln_admin_1282167276_1170989" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To configure a customized period</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: The Repository Status displays the evolution of the restorable (the restorable volume corresponds to all versions of all backed up files and folders) and protected (single version of all protected files and folders, without history) volumes and number of objects, over the time period you choose, by default, one day.

seg-source.mrk: The Repository Status displays the evolution of the restorable (the restorable volume corresponds to all versions of all backed up files and folders) and protected (single version of all protected files and folders, without history) volumes and number of objects, over the time period you choose, by default, one day.

target.mrk: L’état du répertoire de stockage affiche l’évolution en volume des objets restaurables (le volume restaurable correspond à toutes les versions de toutes les sauvegardes de fichiers et répertoires) et protégés (version unique de tous les fichiers et répertoires protégés sans l’historique) et du nombre d’objets, sur la période de temps choisie (par défaut un jour).

trans-unit.source: The Repository Status displays the evolution of the restorable volume (the restorable volume corresponds to all versions of all backed up data) and of the number of streams (one stream represents one backup job) over the time period you choose, by default, one day.

seg-source.mrk: The Repository Status displays the evolution of the restorable volume (the restorable volume corresponds to all versions of all backed up data) and of the number of streams (one stream represents one backup job) over the time period you choose, by default, one day.

target.mrk: L'état du répertoire de stockage affiche l'évolution du volume restaurable (le volume restaurable correspond à toutes les versions de toutes les données sauvegardées) et du nombre de flux (un flux représente un travail de sauvegarde) sur la période que vous choisissez, par défaut, un jour.

trans-unit.source: The Replication Status displays the maximum and average replication lag over the time period you choose, by default, one day. The replication lag is the time between the beginning of the backup and the end of the replication of a stream.

seg-source.mrk: The Replication Status displays the maximum and average replication lag over the time period you choose, by default, one day.
The replication lag is the time between the beginning of the backup and the end of the replication of a stream.

target.mrk: L'état de réplication affiche le délai de réplication maximal et moyen sur la période que vous choisissez, par défaut, un jour.
Le délai de réplication est le temps entre le début de la sauvegarde et la fin de la réplication d'un flux.
